name: Save the Hare
description:
Save the Hare - is a free exciting arcade game in which you have to manage funny fluffy hares. If you love your animals and want a fun few hours of free time, then don't miss their next adventure.

The rules of the game are very simple: help the hare to escape from falling boxes from the top, moving it to an empty field.

But that's not all! Along the way, you need to help the hare to eat, collecting carrots. This will help you to gather extra points and set a new record!

You can control the movements of the hero with just one touch to the HD screen. The gameplay will be very quickly able to understand the players of all ages, from the youngest players to adults who want to escape from a hard day's work or pass the time in public transport.

Our new 2018 game will help you to kill time and relax.

Our popular Game will please with original colorful hand-drawn graphics and lively, attractive animation. Our new game will help you escape from the hustle and bustle.
In our game you can play without ads if you disable this option.
Our New Game "Save the rabbit" - is a very beautiful and colorful.
The game will help you to develop memory, concentration and improve the concentration, motility of the fingers and develops the mind.
Play with your family.

Feature of game:
- The adventure will unfold on two atmospheric playgrounds in the summer and the winter woods.
- Unlock colorful new characters as you progress through the game!
- Simple operation, which is easy to understand even a child.
- Non-Intrusive gameplay does not get boring even after many hours of play!
- It is possible to play without the internet connection.
- The game weighs little.
Download our popular game now and have fun and Relax.
Good Luck To You!
